commands.name: help
commands.description:
Displays all available commands for me! 
 Usage: [prefix] help

commands.name: steam
commands.description:
A link to my creators Steam profile 
 Usage: [prefix] steam

commands.name: source
commands.description:
A link to all my inner workings... 
 Usage: [prefix] source

commands.name: p
commands.description:
Plays the desired song from a YouTube link! 
 Usage: [prefix] p [video query OR URL]

commands.name: pause
commands.description:
pauses the current song being played. 
 Usage: [prefix] pause

commands.name: resume
commands.description:
resumes a paused song. 
 Usage: [prefix] resume

commands.name: s
commands.description:
skips the current song being played, and palys the next in queue! 
 Usage: [prefix] s

commands.name: leave
commands.description:
Guess I'll be going :( 
 Usage: [prefix] leave

commands.name: summon
commands.description:
summons me to your voice channel. 
 Usage: [prefix] summon

commands.name: purge
commands.description:
removes up to 100 messages at a time! 
 Usage: [prefix] purge [deletion amount]

commands.name: reload
commands.description:
reloads a selected command. 
 Usage: [prefix] reload [command name]

commands.name: kick
commands.description:
kicks the specified user. 
 Usage: [prefix] kick [@mention]

commands.name: ban
commands.description:
bans the specified user. 
 Usage: [prefix] ban [@mention]
